en: Do you agree to our proposal?
zh: 你同意我们的提议吗？

en: There are a lot of beautiful roses in our garden.

en: Our garden has two cherry trees.

en: Our town is notorious for its muddy roads.

en: Our town is on the East Side of the river.

en: Our city was covered with smog.

en: There is a large river near our town.

en: There is a large lake near our town.

en: There is a library in our city.

en: There are many parks in our town.

en: A clean river flows through our town, and we can see many carp swimming in it.
zh: 一条清澈的小河穿过我们小镇，能看见里面有很多鲤鱼在游。

en: I wonder if it will snow in our town this winter.
zh: 不知道今年冬天我们镇上会不会下雪。

en: What happened to our order?

en: If our advice had been acted upon, you would not have got into trouble.

en: It is to your advantage to join us.

en: Why don't you join our party?

en: None of us are against her idea.
zh: 我们没人反对她的想法。

en: None of us are opposed to her ideas.
zh: 我们没人反对她的主意。

en: None of us are against his idea.
zh: 我们没人反对他的想法。

en: None of us are opposed to his ideas.
zh: 我们没人反对他的主意。

en: There is not one of us who does not want to help you.
zh: 我们没一个不想帮你的。

en: None of us is so foolish as to believe that he was telling the truth.
zh: 我们还没傻到会信他说的真话。

en: As far as we know, the earth is the only planet to have oceans.
zh: 据我们所知，地球是唯一有海洋的行星。

en: Can you name anyone that we know who is as talented as he is?

en: We came to the conclusion that the ideology was behind the times.
zh: 我们觉得这种思想已经过时了。

en: Our university graduates 1,000 students every year.
zh: 我们大学每年有一千名学生毕业。

en: Our university consists of eight departments.
zh: 我们大学由八个系组成。

en: Any student in our college can use the computer.

en: Many of us are hostile to the consumption tax.
zh: 我们很多人都反感消费税。

en: There were fewer children attending school in our village in 1975 than in 1965.
zh: 1975年我们村上学的孩子比1965年少。

en: Our ancestors came to this country 150 years ago.

en: We saw a castle ahead of us.

en: There lie many difficulties before us.

en: What is that in front of us?

en: The scene lying before us was very beautiful.
zh: 展现在我们面前的景色美极了。

en: I like both plays in our anthology very much.

en: When our ship entered the port, she was no better than a raft.
zh: 我们的船进港时，简直跟个木筏子差不多。

en: We sail for San Francisco on Monday.
zh: 我们周一启程去旧金山。

en: Our teacher was a beautiful lady, but was not the type of person who dressed up.
zh: 我们的老师是个美女，但她不是那种爱打扮的人。

en: Our teacher is fresh out of college.

en: Our teacher is a sincere person, so I look up to him.

en: Our teacher began singing a song well.

en: Our teacher sometimes speaks quickly.

en: Our teacher is in a good temper.

en: Our teacher is always cool.

en: Our teacher is not always kind to us.

zh: 老师总跟我们说，读报纸了解时事非常重要。

en: Our teacher looks very young.

en: Our teacher often overlooked his name on the list.

en: Our teacher is, as it were, a walking dictionary.

en: Our teacher is well spoken of.

en: I do not know the woman talking to our teacher.
zh: 我不认识那个正跟我们老师说话的女人。

zh: 我不认识跟我们老师说话的那个女人。

en: If you compare our product with others, you'll see ours is far better in quality.
zh: 要是把我们的产品跟别人的比比，你就会发现我们的质量好得多。

en: Our life depends largely on oil imported from other countries.

en: Our success was, in the main due to his efforts.
zh: 我们的成功主要归功于他的努力。

en: Our success was due to his efforts.

en: Our success depend on your efforts.

en: Our success, after all, is due to his earnest efforts.

en: Our characters are completely different.

en: Do not leave our generation without hope.

en: Let's try to make our world better.

en: Our world is getting smaller and smaller.

en: We have a lot of English books in the library.

en: I can't think of any other way of getting him to accept our proposal.

en: It is bold of him to refuse our offer.

en: What do you think of our new abode?
zh: 你觉得我们的新家怎么样？

en: It is in April that our school years start.

en: Our diet is full of variety.

en: All our food was rotten.

en: Our office is very comfortable with air conditioning.
zh: 办公室里有空调，待着挺舒服的。

en: The train we'll be on will arrive at 9 p.m.

en: The plane we were aboard was flying over the Pacific toward Wake Island at a height of 3,000 meters.
zh: 我们坐的那架飞机正在三千米的高度飞越太平洋，飞往威克岛。

en: Our plane was about thirty minutes late.

en: Our plane took off at exactly twelve o'clock.

en: Our ship was approaching the harbor.
zh: 我们的船正慢慢靠近港口。

en: Our boss looks over every paper presented to him.
zh: 我们老板会过目每一份交上来的文件。

en: Our request for a pay rise was turned down.
zh: 我们加薪的要求被拒绝了。

en: Our request for a pay raise was turned down.
zh: 我们涨工资的要求被驳回了。

en: Our paths have crossed very often.

en: Our meeting was quite accidental.

en: Let's keep beautiful nature around us.

en: He works too slowly to be helpful to us.

en: Do you need our help?

en: Our letters crossed each other.

en: Our chief concern should be the aging of society.

en: Our car happened to pass theirs by the station.

en: Our car is three years older than yours.

en: Let's see if our cars have enough gas.

en: Please accept our heartfelt apologies.

en: What passes for leisure in our society is actually time-consuming.

en: Our office is located the center of the city.

en: All our attempts were in vain.

en: Our thought is expressed by means of words.

en: Our city is getting bigger and bigger.

en: Our best efforts availed us little.

en: We love our country with every grade of love.

en: Are you dissatisfied with our decision?

en: Our hens laid a lot of eggs yesterday.

en: Our plan hasn't the ghost of chance.

en: Our vacation will soon come to an end.

en: He believes that there is a spy among us.

en: There are a number of things we can do to protect our environment.

en: Our school is larger than theirs.

en: Our school begins at eight-thirty.

en: Our school is in the center of the town.

en: There are more girls than boys at our school.

en: Our school is fifty years old.

en: Our school stands on a hill.

en: Our school did away with uniforms last year.

en: Our school stands near the park.

en: Our school is surrounded by a healthy environment.

en: Our school stands on a hill, so we can see the town.

en: Our school stands on the hill.

en: Our school has broken up for the summer.

en: Our school stands in the village.

en: Our school is ten minutes' walk from here.

en: Our school is famous for its club activities.

en: Our school was not the same size as yours.
zh: 我们学校以前没你们的大小。

en: Our school starts at 7:15.

en: Our school accepted three Americans as exchange students.

en: Our school has accepted three Americans as exchange students.
zh: 我们学校接收了三名美国交换生。

en: Our school is right across the river.

en: Our school's gym is under construction now.
zh: 我们学校的体育馆现在正在盖呢。

en: Our school library is small, but new.
zh: 我们学校图书馆虽然小，但是挺新的。

en: Our school library has many books.

en: The principal of our school is an American.

en: There is a big park near our school.
zh: 我们学校附近有个大公园。

en: An article about our school appeared in the newspaper.

en: The youngest teacher at our school is not so young.

en: The youngest teacher at our school isn't so young.
zh: 我们学校最年轻的老师其实也不年轻了。

en: The youngest teacher at our school isn't all that young.

en: We have a nice school library.

en: Our school has about one thousand students.
zh: 我们学校大约有一千个学生。

en: We have a boxing club in our school.

en: Our school has nine classes.

en: Our school has ten classes.

en: Our school has twenty-four classes in all.

en: We wear uniforms at our school.

en: Our school encourages sports.

en: How about asking her to join our trip abroad?
zh: 叫她跟我们一起去国外旅游怎么样？

en: Our conversation opened, as usual, upon the weather.
zh: 像往常一样，我们的谈话是以天气开始的。

zh: 我们的会议就在这个房间里开。

en: We have two unused rooms in our house.

en: Our house commands a beautiful view.

en: We overlook the bay from our house.

en: Our hypothesis is based on thorough experiments.

zh: 一场突如其来的雪把我们的修学旅行给搞砸了。

en: Who is that boy running toward us?
zh: 那个朝我们跑过来的男孩是谁？

en: Each one of us should do his best.

en: The pupils of our eyes contract in sunlight.
zh: 我们的瞳孔在阳光下会收缩。

en: Our picnic plates are made of plastic.
zh: 我们野餐用的盘子是塑料的。

en: Our picnic was altogether spoiled by the rain.
zh: 下雨把我们的野餐彻底搞砸了。

en: There is a fine view from our balcony.
zh: 阳台上的视野特别棒。

en: Our bus collided with a truck.
zh: 我们的校车和一辆大货车撞了。

en: Won't you look in on us?
zh: 你不打算顺便来看看我们吗？

en: We had unexpected visitors.
zh: 家里突然来了几个不速之客。

en: Our television has been out of order for more than a week.
zh: 我们家的电视已经坏了一个多星期了。

en: Our team gained a great victory.
zh: 我们队赢得了一场大胜。

en: Our team won their match yesterday.
zh: 我们队昨天的比赛赢了。

en: Our team defeated our opponent 5-4.
zh: 我们队以五比四击败了对手。

en: Would you like to join our team?
zh: 你想加入我们队吗？

en: I think it certain that our team will win.
zh: 我觉得我们队肯定会赢。

en: I heard the news that our team had won.
zh: 我听说我们队赢了。

en: I'm sure that our team will win.
zh: 我敢肯定我们队会赢。

en: Our team is likely to win the game.
zh: 我们队很有可能会赢。

en: The odds are even that our team will win the game.
zh: 我们队赢球的几率是一半一半。

en: I think it certain our team will the win the game.
zh: 我觉得我们队准能赢这场比赛。

en: Not all of us are against her idea.
zh: 我们并不是所有人都反对她的想法。

en: All we should do is wait and see what he'll do.
zh: 我们现在能做的就是等着看他会怎么做。

en: You were considerate not to disturb us.
zh: 你真体贴，没来打扰我们。

en: Could you take our picture?
zh: 能帮我们拍张照吗？

en: Our garbage is collected three times a week.
zh: 我们这儿一周收三次垃圾。

en: I think it is about time we changed our ways of disposing of waste.
zh: 我觉得该改改我们处理垃圾的方式了。

en: Your impetuous remarks about us seem to have rung down the curtain on our good relationship.
zh: 你对我们那些冲动的评价，好像断送了我们之间的好关系。

en: Our group consisted of five persons.
zh: 我们这组一共五个人。

en: Our club activities are always spoiled by his behavior.
zh: 社团活动总是被他的行为搞得一团糟。

en: We welcome you to our club.
zh: 欢迎加入我们的俱乐部。

en: Our club will hold its monthly meeting next Wednesday.
zh: 我们俱乐部下周三开月会。

en: Whoever wants to join our club will be welcome.
zh: 谁想加入我们俱乐部都欢迎。

en: Can you persuade him to join our club?
zh: 你能劝劝他加入我们的俱乐部吗？

en: Our club has three times as many members as yours.
zh: 我们俱乐部的人数是你们的三倍。

en: Our class went on an excursion to Hakone.
zh: 我们班去箱根旅行了。

en: Our class has a meeting once a week.
zh: 我们班每周开一次会。

en: Our class is made up of 30 students.
zh: 我们班有30个学生。

en: John, the tallest boy in our class, is nicknamed "Mr High."
zh: 约翰是我们班最高的男生，绰号叫“高先生”。

en: Our class were all glad to hear it.
zh: 听到这个消息，我们全班都很高兴。

en: Our class has twenty-five boys and twenty girls.
zh: 我们班有25个男生和20个女生。

en: There are forty-seven students in our class.
zh: 我们班有47个学生。

en: Something funny is always happening in our class.
zh: 我们班总会发生些有趣的事。

en: Our first lesson today is English.
zh: 今天我们第一节是英语课。

en: There are few routines in our office.
zh: 我们办公室没什么死板的规矩。

en: Any one of us could do it.
zh: 我们中谁都能做。

en: This is all the air that is available to us.
zh: 我们能用的空气就这些了。

en: You may as well tell us the truth.
zh: 你还是跟我们说实话吧。

en: Thank you for lending us the book.
zh: 谢谢你把书借给我们。

en: We need mental skills, not manual ones.
zh: 我们需要的是脑力活，不是体力活。

en: There is food enough for us.
zh: 我们的食物够吃了。

en: We have enough food.
zh: 我们的食物够了。

en: Would you mind taking a picture of us?
zh: 能帮我们拍张照吗？

en: Whoever comes to see us is welcome.
zh: 谁来看我们都欢迎。

en: By all means stop in to see us.
zh: 务必顺便来看看我们啊。

en: Sing us a song, please.
zh: 给我们唱首歌吧。

en: Will you sing some English songs for us?
zh: 能给我们唱几首英文歌吗？

en: Would you sing us a song in English?
zh: 你能给我们唱首英文歌吗？

en: We still have masses of work.
zh: 我们还有一大堆活儿要干。

en: We have no secrets from each other.
zh: 我们之间没有秘密。

en: We went by the shop without noticing it.
zh: 我们路过那家店时没注意到。

en: We had little water.
zh: 我们几乎没水了。

en: We only had a little water.
zh: 我们只有一点点水。

en: We have a lot of problems to deal with.
zh: 我们有很多问题要处理。

en: Don't forget that we have homework.
zh: 别忘了我们还有作业。

en: We need a sample in addition to materials.
zh: 除了材料，我们还需要一个样本。

en: We have the right to live where we please.
zh: 我们有权住在自己想住的地方。

en: We have a lot of assignments for the summer vacation.
zh: 我们暑假有很多作业。

en: We had no water to drink.
zh: 我们没水喝了。

en: We have a holiday cottage in Denver.
zh: 我们在丹佛有一间度假屋。

en: We have lots of things to do.
zh: 我们有很多事要做。

en: I have two sons. One is in Nara and the other in Tsu.
zh: 我有两个儿子，一个在奈良，另一个在津市。

en: We have thirteen clubs.
zh: 我们有13个俱乐部。

en: We have a right to live wherever we want to.
zh: 我们有权住在任何想住的地方。

en: We have vast amounts of unused information.
zh: 我们有大量没用上的信息。

en: The important thing to us is a friend.
zh: 对我们来说，朋友最重要。

en: Health is the most precious thing we have.
zh: 健康是我们拥有的最宝贵的东西。

en: To us, school was a place to get away from as soon as possible.
zh: 对我们来说，学校是个想尽快逃离的地方。

en: All we can do is carry on the work until we finish it.
zh: 我们能做的就是继续工作，直到干完为止。

en: Will you tell us a story?
zh: 你能给我们讲个故事吗？

en: Won't you go out to lunch with us?
zh: 要不要跟我们一起去吃午饭？

en: Why not have dinner with us?
zh: 要不跟我们一起吃晚饭吧？

en: How about taking a walk with us?
zh: 跟我们一起去散散步怎么样？

en: Can you go with us?
zh: 你能跟我们一起去吗？

en: Will you play tennis with us?
zh: 要不要跟我们一起打网球？

en: Why don't you go to school with us?
zh: 怎么不跟我们一起去上学呢？

en: Come along with us.
zh: 跟我们一起来吧。

en: We'll carry it to the barn.
zh: 我们把它搬到谷仓去。

en: Let's play by ourselves.
zh: 我们自己玩吧。

en: There is another question too that we must discuss.
zh: 我们还得讨论另外一个问题。

en: The thief broke into the house while we were away.
zh: 我们不在家的时候，小偷闯进了屋子。

en: Who'll take care of the dog while we're gone?
zh: 我们不在的时候，谁来照看狗？

en: We need someone to keep an eye on our baby while we are away.
zh: 我们不在的时候，需要有人帮着盯着点宝宝。

en: Speak more slowly so that we can understand you.
zh: 请说慢一点，好让我们听明白。

en: It is doubtful whether we shall be able to come.
zh: 我们能不能来还不一定。

en: Our father used to read us happy stories when we were small.
zh: 我们小时候，爸爸经常给我们读些快乐的故事。

en: When we were small, father used to read us moving stories.
zh: 我们小时候，爸爸经常给我们读些感人的故事。

en: There are more people than we expected.
zh: 人比我们预想的要多。

en: We got three times as many people as we expected.
zh: 来的人是预想的三倍。

en: It was because he was ill that we decided to return.
zh: 就是因为他病了，我们才决定回去的。

en: Whether we play tennis tomorrow depends on the weather.
zh: 明天打不打网球得看天气。

en: It's good for us to eat vegetables every day.
zh: 每天吃蔬菜对我们有好处。

en: The next morning, to our great relief, he returned home safe and sound.
zh: 第二天早上他平安到家，让我们松了一大口气。

en: He had been working on his novel for six months when we visited him.
zh: 我们去看他的时候，他写那本小说已经写了六个月了。

en: He was being taught English by his brother when we called on him.
zh: 我们去找他的时候，他哥哥正在教他英语。

en: Didn't you notice us going out of the room?
zh: 你没看见我们出屋子吗？

en: When we entered the room, he stood up.
zh: 我们进屋的时候，他站了起来。

en: The sort of information we need is not always available.
zh: 我们需要的那种信息不一定总能找得到。

en: The sort of information we need isn't always available.
zh: 我们需要的那种信息不一定总能找得到。

en: To our great disappointment we failed to carry out intention.
zh: 让我们大失所望的是，我们没能实现计划。

en: There are a lot of problems we can't avoid.
zh: 有很多问题是我们避不开的。

en: It happened that he was ill in bed when we visited him.
zh: 我们去看他的时候，正好赶上他病倒在床。

en: I think it impossible for us to beat him.
zh: 我觉得我们不可能赢过他。

en: I think it's impossible for us to beat him.
zh: 我觉得我们不可能赢过他。

en: By the time we reach his town, he will have moved to his new house.
zh: 等我们赶到他住的小镇时，他应该已经搬进新家了。

en: It was not easy for us to find his house.
zh: 我们找他家可真不容易。

en: It is easy for us to agree with his opinion.
zh: 我们很容易就能赞成他的观点。

en: It is easy for us to speak Japanese.
zh: 对我们来说，说日语挺容易的。

en: The day when we will arrive falls on Sunday.
zh: 我们到的那天正好是周日。

en: How long had you been waiting when we arrived?
zh: 我们到的时候，你已经等了多久了？

en: We arrived to find a huge meal ready for us.
zh: 我们一到就发现已经有一大桌饭菜在等着我们了。

en: The plane we boarded was bound for San Francisco.
zh: 我们坐的那架飞机是飞往旧金山的。

en: Just imagine that we can fly like birds.
zh: 试想一下我们要能像鸟儿一样飞。

en: The meeting will have broken up by the time we arrive.
zh: 等我们到那儿，散会都散了。

en: When we arrived, the lecture had already begun.
zh: 我们到的时候，讲座已经开始了。

en: Our delay was due to traffic congestion.
zh: 我们耽搁了是因为堵车。

en: You must be the temporary we asked for.
zh: 你一定就是我们要找的那个临时工。

en: The hotel where we stayed was very comfortable.
zh: 我们住的那家酒店很舒服。

en: As soon as we are born, the world gets to work on us and transforms us from merely biological into social units.
zh: 从我们出生那一刻起，世界就开始影响我们，把我们从单纯的生物个体转变为社会单元。

en: We need plants in order to live.
zh: 我们生存需要植物。

en: Your help is necessary to our success.
zh: 没有你的帮助，我们就没法成功。

en: It's important for us to think about the future of the world.
zh: 对我们来说，考虑世界的未来非常重要。

en: As we need fresh air, so fish need clean water.
zh: 就像我们需要新鲜空气一样，鱼也离不开干净的水。

en: It's time for us to go to bed.
zh: 我们该去睡觉了。

en: We all try to get together at least once a year.
zh: 我们都尽量一年至少聚一次。

en: It is true that we desire to live in a small town.
zh: 我们确实挺想住在小镇上的。

en: Do you remember the night when we first met?
zh: 你还记得我们第一次见面的那个晚上吗？

en: The day when we first met was a rainy day.
zh: 我们第一次见面那天是个下雨天。

en: I'll never forget the day when we first met.
zh: 我永远忘不了我们第一次见面的那天。

en: I'll never forget the day we first met.
zh: 我永远忘不了我们第一次见面的那天。

en: Scarcely had we started out before the sky became overcast and down came the rain again.
zh: 我们刚出发，天就阴了，接着又下起雨来了。

en: Hardly had we started when it began to rain.
zh: 我们刚出发就开始下雨了。

en: The house was in good order when we left.
zh: 我们走的时候，房子里整整齐齐的。

en: We had hardly started when it began to rain.
zh: 我们刚出发就开始下雨了。

en: The hotel room where we stayed was shabby.
zh: 我们住的那个酒店房间挺破的。

en: The house in which we lived was torn down.
zh: 我们以前住的那个房子被拆了。

en: The house we used to live in was torn down.
zh: 我们以前住的那个房子被拆了。

en: It is by reading newspapers and books that we can keep up with the time.
zh: 只有多看书看报，我们才能跟上时代。

en: That we will win the game is certain.
zh: 我们这场比赛肯定能赢。

en: It will be snowing when we arrive at Shiga Heights.
zh: 等我们到志贺高原的时候，天肯定在下雪。

en: We had not finished our work before the bell rang.
zh: 铃响的时候，我们活儿还没干完呢。

en: I remember the day when we first met.
zh: 我记得我们第一次见面的那天。

en: The first thing we did was look at the pandas.
zh: 我们做的第一件事就是去看大熊猫。

en: No sooner had we sat down than she brought us coffee.
zh: 我们刚坐下，她就把咖啡端来了。

en: As soon as we sat down, she brought us coffee.
zh: 我们一坐下，她就把咖啡送过来了。

en: It seems that there is no way out of our difficulty.
zh: 看来我们现在的困难是没法解决了。

en: The higher we went, the colder it became.
zh: 越往高处走，天就越冷。

en: We found the boy fast asleep.
zh: 我们发现那个男孩睡得很沉。

en: We found the boy sound asleep.
zh: 我们发现那个男孩睡得正香。

en: There is nothing to prevent us from going.
zh: 没什么能拦着我们，不让我们去。

en: There are lots of things for us to think about.
zh: 我们有很多事情要考虑。

en: Of all the houses we've looked at, this one is by far the best.
zh: 在我们看过的所有房子里，这间绝对是最好的。

en: He saw us off until he could not see us anymore.
zh: 他一直目送我们离开，直到看不见为止。

en: The day will come when we can travel to the moon.
zh: 总有一天我们能去月球旅行。

en: It is already ten years since we got married.
zh: 我们已经结婚十年了。

en: It's already been ten years since we got married.
zh: 我们结婚都已经十年了。

en: We married seven years ago.
zh: 我们是七年前结婚的。

en: It's been seven years since we got married.
zh: 我们已经结婚七年了。

en: My father bought this house for us when we got married.
zh: 我爸在我们结婚的时候给我们买了这套房子。

en: At the time we got married, his parents had already died.
zh: 我们结婚那会儿，他父母已经过世了。

en: The lion began to roar as we approached.
zh: 我们一靠近，狮子就开始吼叫。

en: To our surprise, her prediction came true.
zh: 让我们没想到的是，她的预言竟然成真了。

en: To our surprise, he won the grand prize.
zh: 让我们大吃一惊的是，他竟然得了大奖。

en: To our surprise, Emi won the 400-meter race with ease.
zh: 让我们意外的是，惠美轻而易举就赢了400米赛跑。

en: To our surprise, Betty won the trophy.
zh: 让我们没想到的是，贝蒂竟然拿到了奖杯。

en: Society will be better if we work together.
zh: 如果我们大家能一起努力，社会会变得更好。

en: You are welcome to the use of our house while we are away on vacation.
zh: 我们去度假的时候，随时欢迎你来用我们的房子。

en: Hardly had we come home when it began to rain.
zh: 我们刚一到家，天就开始下雨了。

en: It started raining as soon as we got home.
zh: 我们一到家，就开始下雨了。

en: Not a day goes by without our hearing of an environmental problem.
zh: 简直没有一天我们听不到关于环境问题的消息。

en: The lesson which we learned was never to trust anyone.
zh: 我们学到的教训就是永远不要相信任何人。

en: It takes us a long time to master a foreign language.
zh: 掌握一门外语得花很长时间。

en: There is no problem that we have to solve.
zh: 我们没有什么必须解决的问题。

en: The day will soon come when we can take a trip to Mars.
zh: 很快我们就能去火星旅行了。

en: He will be wondering what we are doing.
zh: 他肯定在琢磨我们在干嘛。

en: No sooner had we reached the station than it began to rain.
zh: 我们刚到车站就下雨了。

en: The train had already left when we got to station.
zh: 我们到火车站的时候，火车已经开了。

en: It is already five years since we began to study English.
zh: 我们开始学英语都已经五年了。

en: It's already been five years since we began to study English.
zh: 我们开始学英语都已经五年了。

en: The day will come when space travel becomes possible.
zh: 太空旅行实现的那一天总会到来的。

en: I remember the happy days we spent together.
zh: 我还记得我们一起度过的快乐时光。

en: A book, if read through, may be said to be cheaper than anything else.
zh: 一本书要是读透了，其实比什么都划算。

en: Therefore it is important for us to be aware of other forms of politeness.
zh: 所以了解其他形式的礼貌很重要。

en: It was a real challenge for us to go down the cliff on a rope.
zh: 对我们来说，用绳子下悬崖真的是个挑战。

en: What we need most is your attendance.
zh: 我们最需要的就是你能到场。

en: Our decision to go to Portugal was quite arbitrary.
zh: 我们决定去葡萄牙其实挺随意的。

en: It had already got dark when we arrived at the hotel.
zh: 我们到酒店的时候天都已经黑了。

en: We have a magnificent view of the ocean from our hotel room.
zh: 从我们酒店房间看出去，海景简直绝了。

en: It was too late for us to do anything else.
zh: 对我们来说，想再做点别的已经太晚了。

en: The train left just as we arrived at the platform.
zh: 我们刚到站台，火车就开了。

en: That we met in Paris was a fortunate accident.
zh: 我们在巴黎相遇真是一场幸运的巧合。

en: When we put magnets on the pigeon's heads, what was the reaction?
zh: 我们把磁铁放在鸽子头上的时候，它们有什么反应？

en: The bus had already left when we got to the bus stop.
zh: 我们到公交站的时候，车已经走了。

en: To know where we are is important.
zh: 知道自己在什么地方很重要。

en: She turned up just as we were starting our meal.
zh: 我们刚要开饭，她就来了。

en: We were just about to leave when it rained.
zh: 我们刚准备走就下雨了。

en: It began to rain heavily just as we got to the gate.
zh: 我们刚到大门口就开始下大雨了。

en: We had scarcely arrived at the Institution for the Blind when I began to make friends with the little blind children.
zh: 我们刚到盲人学院，我就开始和那里的盲童交朋友了。

en: Do you remember the day when we saw the accident?
zh: 你还记得咱们目睹那场事故的那天吗？

en: When we arrived at the house, Chin and Chilla were sitting at the top of a broad flight of stairs.
zh: 我们到那栋房子的时候，Chin和Chilla正坐在宽宽的台阶顶上。

en: By the time we got there, the ship had left.
zh: 等我们赶到那儿，船已经开了。

en: By the time we got there, he had left.
zh: 等我们赶到那儿，他已经走了。

en: The meeting will have finished by the time we get there.
zh: 等我们赶到那儿，会议应该已经结束了。

en: As soon as we got there, it began to rain.
zh: 我们一到那儿就开始下雨了。

en: It was a strange chance that we met there again.
zh: 我们又在那儿碰见真是奇遇。

en: It was easy for us to find Jane.
zh: 我们找简挺容易的。

en: We experience and understand the world through signals that are received by the senses and interpreted by the brain - and both stages are subject to distortion.
zh: 我们通过感官接收信号并由大脑解读来感知和理解世界，而这两个阶段都可能产生偏差。

en: We are here because we have a right to be involved in these decisions.
zh: 我们在这儿是因为我们有权参与这些决定。

en: The hotel we stayed at last summer is near the lake.
zh: 我们去年夏天住的那家酒店就在湖边。

en: We have no reason for staying here.
zh: 我们没理由留在这儿。

en: When we told Koko the news, she was silent for about ten minutes.
zh: 我们把消息告诉可可时，她沉默了大概十分钟。

en: It is with great pleasure that we welcome you here.
zh: 我们非常高兴能在这儿欢迎你。

en: No wonder we associate bats with dark places.
zh: 怪不得我们会把蝙蝠和阴暗的地方联系在一起。

en: When we made fun of her, she blushed.
zh: 我们开她玩笑的时候，她脸红了。

en: She cut in when we were talking.
zh: 我们说话的时候，她插了一嘴。

en: How can we make it up to you for all that you have suffered because of us?
zh: 你因为我们受了这么多苦，我们要怎么补偿你才好？

en: It is doubtful if we can get the engine working.
zh: 我怀疑我们能不能把这引擎发动起来。

en: We had not gone very far when it started to rain.
zh: 我们没走多远就开始下雨了。

en: We hadn't gone very far when it started to rain.
zh: 我们没走多远就开始下雨了。

en: It is dangerous for us to be out after eight o'clock.
zh: 八点以后出门对我们来说太危险了。

en: You cannot think how good a time we had.
zh: 你想象不到我们玩得有多开心。

en: I was the shorter of us two.
zh: 我们俩里我比较矮。

en: What will we be doing this time next week?
zh: 下周这个时候我们在干嘛呢？

en: We listened to the shooting.
zh: 我们听到了枪声。

en: We saw terrible scenes on TV.
zh: 我们在电视上看到了很可怕的画面。

en: We asked him on the interphone if he could come downstairs quickly.
zh: 我们用对讲机问他能不能快点下楼。

en: On TV we saw Mummy's office in flames.
zh: 我们在电视上看到妈妈的办公室着火了。

en: We're worried about Grandma and Grandpa.
zh: 我们挺担心爷爷奶奶的。

en: I think we can get along well.
zh: 我觉得我们会相处得很好。

en: I'm afraid we won't be able to help you tomorrow.
zh: 恐怕我们明天帮不了你了。

en: I'm afraid that we won't be able to help you tomorrow.
zh: 恐怕我们明天没法帮你。

en: Not merely I but also he is invited to the party.
zh: 不光是我，他也受邀参加派对了。

en: There was no one left but me.
zh: 就剩我一个人了。

en: Nobody was hungry except me.
zh: 除了我，谁都不饿。

en: I alone did it.
zh: 这事儿是我一个人干的。

en: I wish to resign from my work for purely personal reasons.
zh: 我想辞职，纯粹是个人原因。

en: I like this song; it's got a strong beat and you can dance to it.
zh: 我挺喜欢这首歌的，节奏感很强，跳起舞来很带劲。

en: Don't interrupt me while I'm speaking.
zh: 我说话的时候别打断我。

en: Be quiet while I am speaking.
zh: 我说话的时候请保持安静。

en: Don't interrupt me while I am talking.
zh: 我正在说话，别插嘴。

en: As I was speaking, Mother came up.
zh: 我正说着呢，妈就过来了。

en: Please don't interrupt me while I'm talking.
zh: 请不要在我说话的时候打断我。

en: While I was speaking, he said nothing.
zh: 我说话的时候，他一言不发。

en: While we were speaking, he kept silent.
zh: 我们说话时，他一直保持沉默。

en: Be quiet while I'm speaking.
zh: 我在说话，安静点。

en: The man I was talking to is my English teacher.
zh: 刚才跟我说话的那个人是我英语老师。

en: The man to whom I spoke was a German, not an American.
zh: 和我交谈的那个人是个德国人，不是美国人。

en: Please answer me when I speak to you.
zh: 我跟你说话的时候请回我一下。

en: Please remind me to turn in the paper.
zh: 记得提醒我交论文。

en: Do I sound in love?
zh: 我听起来像是在谈恋爱吗？

en: Does it sound like I'm in love?
zh: 听我这口气，像恋爱了吗？

en: In case I miss the train, don't wait to start.
zh: 万一我没赶上火车，你们就先走，别等我。

en: There are several good reasons why I have a freezer.
zh: 我买冰柜是有几个好理由的。

en: Do not let go of the rope till I tell you.
zh: 我没叫你放手前，别松绳子。

en: A burglar broke into my house while I was away on a trip.
zh: 我出去旅游的时候，家里进小偷了。

en: I'll get Meg to do my work during my absence.
zh: 我不在的时候，我会让梅格代我的班。

en: I'd like you to look after my dog.
zh: 我想请你帮我照看一下我的狗。

en: My sister took care of the dog while I was away.
zh: 我不在的时候，是我姐姐在照顾狗。

en: Will you look after my dog while I am away?
zh: 我不在的时候，你能帮我照看下狗吗？

en: Every time I drop in to visit, they constantly get in my hair.
zh: 每次我去串门，他们老是烦我。

en: You know that I don't like eggs.
zh: 你知道我不喜欢吃鸡蛋。

en: I want nothing but health.
zh: 我只要身体健康。

en: All I want is money.
zh: 我只想要钱。

en: What I want is a word processor.
zh: 我想要的是个文字处理机。

en: As I was taking leave of my friend, he said he would be glad to see me again before long.
zh: 跟我朋友告别时，他说希望能很快再见到我。

en: I was walking in the park with a friend of mine when it started raining.
zh: 我正跟个朋友在公园散步呢，天就开始下雨了。

en: The man who I thought was my friend deceived me.
zh: 我原以为他是我的朋友，结果他竟然骗了我。

en: She was very angry with me when I forgot the appointment.
zh: 我忘了约会的事，她对我非常生气。

en: He was very angry with me when I forgot the appointment.
zh: 我忘了约会，他对我非常生气。

en: When I forgot my promise, he got really angry.
zh: 我没守信用，他真的很生气。

en: Please wait until I come back.
zh: 请等我回来。

en: Wait here till I return.
zh: 在这儿等我回来。

en: Wait here until I come back.
zh: 在这儿等我回来。

en: I want you to stay here until I get back.
zh: 我想让你在这儿一直等到我回来。

en: When I came back, my car was gone.
zh: 我回来的时候，我的车已经不见了。

en: It was broad daylight when I woke up.
zh: 我醒来的时候，天已经大亮了。

en: The sun had already risen when I woke up.
zh: 我醒来的时候，太阳已经升起来了。

en: I awoke to find that he had already gone.
zh: 我醒来发现他已经走了。

en: When I woke up, all other passengers had gotten off.
zh: 我醒来的时候，其他乘客都已经下车了。

en: When I awoke, he had already been there.
zh: 我醒来的时候，他已经在那里了。

en: She got all the more angry because I kept silent.
zh: 因为我一直没吭声，她反而更生气了。

en: I will see to it.
zh: 我会处理的。

en: The first thing I want to do tomorrow is to find a good part-time job.
zh: 明天我第一件想做的事就是找一份好的兼职。

en: Raise your hand when I call your name.
zh: 叫到你名字的时候请举手。

en: Please turn out the light so that I can sleep.
zh: 请把灯关了，好让我睡觉。

en: Please turn off the light so that I can sleep.
zh: 请关下灯，好让我睡觉。

en: What I'd really like is something cold to drink.
zh: 我现在真的很想喝点冰的东西。

en: There was a large sound when I was reading a book.
zh: 我看书的时候，听到了一声巨响。

en: In case I forget, please remind me.
zh: 万一我忘了，请提醒我一下。

en: She was out when I called.
zh: 我打电话的时候她不在家。

en: When I called, he had already set off.
zh: 我打电话的时候他已经出发了。

en: She was engaged in some interesting work when I arrived.
zh: 我到的时候，她正忙着做一些有趣的工作。

en: It is Paris that I want to visit.
zh: 我想去的地方是巴黎。

en: Every time I call on you, you're out.
zh: 每次我去找你，你都不在。

en: Every time I call on you, you are out.
zh: 每次我去找你，你都不在。

en: The man that I visited was Mr. Doi.
zh: 我拜访的那个人是土井先生。

en: The only trouble I've ever had was dealing with people who didn't like my personality.
zh: 我遇到的唯一麻烦就是和那些不喜欢我性格的人打交道。

en: The moment I held the baby in my arms, it began to cry.
zh: 我一抱起宝宝，他就哭了起来。

en: As I was walking, it began to rain.
zh: 我走着走着，就开始下雨了。

en: I was about to reply, when he boldly cut in.
zh: 我正要回答，他却突然插话。

en: We parted the best of friends.
zh: 我们分开时依然是好朋友。

en: That's not what I heard.
zh: 我听到的不是这样的。

en: That's not what I've heard.
zh: 这和我听到的不一样。

en: That's not likely in so far as I can see.
zh: 据我所知，那应该不太可能。

en: I'm glad it's not coming out of my pocket.
zh: 很高兴不用我自掏腰包。

en: I'm glad that I'm not paying.
zh: 很高兴不用我买单。

en: I had hardly got into the bath when the phone rang.
zh: 我刚进浴缸，电话就响了。

en: It was my turn to clean the room.
zh: 轮到我打扫房间了。

en: As I entered the room, they applauded.
zh: 我进屋时，他们都鼓起掌来。

en: He was having lunch when I entered the room.
zh: 我进屋时，他正在吃午饭。

en: When I entered the room, I found a dog.
zh: 我进屋的时候，发现了一只狗。

en: I enter the room, where I found an old man sleeping.
zh: 我进到屋里，发现一个老人在睡觉。

en: My son had been writing for several hours when I entered the room.
zh: 我进屋的时候，我儿子已经写了好几个小时了。

en: They stopped talking as soon as I came into the room.
zh: 我一进屋，他们就不说话了。

en: I'll take my father's place.
zh: 我会接替我父亲的位置。

en: I am to take over my father's business.
zh: 我要接管我父亲的生意。

en: It was when I was eight years old that I climbed Mt. Fuji with my father.
zh: 我八岁那年和父亲一起爬了富士山。

en: When I asked Dad for more money, he really blew up and started to yell at me.
zh: 当我找我爸多要点钱时，他真的火了，开始对我大吼大叫。

en: They would never fuss about me if I were Fred Smith.
zh: 如果我是弗雷德·史密斯，他们绝不会对我大惊小怪。

en: It isn't what he says that annoys me but the way he says it.
zh: 让我生气的不是他说的话，而是他说话的语气。

en: He will be my deputy while I am away.
zh: 我不在的时候，他来当我的副手。

en: Shun will take over my job while I'm away.
zh: 我不在的时候，阿瞬会接替我的工作。

en: Rie Kawada will do my job while I'm gone.
zh: 我不在的时候，川田理惠会接手我的工作。

en: Jill was a great comfort to me when I was ill.
zh: 我生病的时候，吉尔给了我很大的安慰。

en: I wish I were a millionaire.
zh: 要是我个百万富翁就好了。

en: What I need is not money, but your advice.
zh: 我需要的不是钱，而是你的建议。

en: What I need isn't money, but your advice.
zh: 我需要的不是钱，而是你的建议。

en: Miho was in the living room when I visited her.
zh: 我去看美穗的时候，她在客厅里。

en: The airplane took off as soon as I arrived at the airport.
zh: 我一到机场，飞机就起飞了。

en: It is not so much the heat as the humidity that makes me tired.
zh: 让我觉得累的不是天热，而是湿气太重。

en: I am far from sad.
zh: 我一点儿也不难过。

en: She had been sick for a week when I visited her.
zh: 我去看她的时候，她已经病了一个星期了。

en: She was absorbed in listening to music when I visited her.
zh: 我去看她的时候，她正听音乐听得入神。

en: It was here that I saw her.
zh: 我就是在这里见到她的。

en: As I love her, so she loved me.
zh: 我爱她，正如她爱我一样。

en: She loved me in the same way that I loved her.
zh: 她爱我，就像我爱她那样。

en: She loved me, as I loved her.
zh: 她爱我，就像我爱她一样。

en: I kept gazing at her until she, totally confused, dropped her gaze.
zh: 我一直盯着她看，直到她彻底慌了神，低下了头。

en: If only I could speak English as fluently as she does!
zh: 要是我英语能说得像她那么溜就好了！

en: If I were in her place, I wouldn't give up yet.
zh: 要是换做是我，我还没打算放弃。

en: It is a fact that I don't know her name.
zh: 事实是我真的不知道她叫什么。

en: I wrote the song for her.
zh: 这首歌是我专门为她写的。

en: The ring I gave her had a tiny stone in it.
zh: 我送给她的那枚戒指上嵌了一颗小石头。

en: She was approaching thirty when I first met her.
zh: 我第一次见到她的时候，她快三十岁了。

en: Some smart alecks cut in when I was asking her to marry me.
zh: 我向她求婚的时候，有几个自以为是的家伙过来插嘴。

en: It was yesterday that I met her.
zh: 我是昨天见到她的。

en: Every time I went to see her, she went out.
zh: 每次我去看她，她都刚好出门了。

en: I will explain it to her.
zh: 我会跟她解释清楚的。

en: Would that I had married her!
zh: 我要是当初娶了她就好了！

en: He was absorbed in reading when I visited him.
zh: 我去找他的时候，他正看书看入迷了。

en: It was only yesterday that I called on him.
zh: 我昨天才刚去拜访过他。

en: It happened that he was out when I visited him.
zh: 我去看他的时候，碰巧他不在。

en: There is no reason why I should help him.
zh: 我没理由非得帮他。

en: It is because he is honest that I like him.
zh: 我喜欢他就是因为他为人诚实。

en: He was sitting in the library when I saw him.
zh: 我看到他的时候，他正坐在图书馆里。

en: I invited him to the party and he accepted.
zh: 我邀请他参加聚会，他答应了。

en: When I called on him, he was talking on the phone.
zh: 我去找他的时候，他正打电话呢。

en: Just stay put for a minute while I look for him.
zh: 待在这儿别动，我去找找他。

en: When I visited their apartment, the couple was right in the middle of an argument.
zh: 我到他们公寓时，那两口子正吵架呢。

en: When I entered his room, I found him reading a book.
zh: 我进他屋子时，发现他正在看书。

en: When I entered his room, he was reading a book.
zh: 我进他屋子时，他正看书呢。

en: It is doubtful whether he will accept my proposal or not.
zh: 他会不会接受我的提议还真不好说。

en: I will take his place.
zh: 我会接替他的位置。

en: When I got to his house, he had already been taken away.
zh: 我到他家时，他已经被带走了。

en: It is difficult for me to understand him.
zh: 我很难理解他这个人。

en: What do you think he said when I asked him for a favor?
zh: 你觉得我请他帮忙的时候他说了什么？

en: The money I have given him amounts to $10,000.
zh: 我给过他的钱加起来有一万美金了。

en: I have to run faster to catch up with him.
zh: 我得跑快点儿才能赶上他。

en: I'll give him a piece of advice.
zh: 我会给他个建议。

en: Is there any reason why I must obey him?
zh: 我凭什么非得听他的？

en: It was yesterday that I saw him.
zh: 我是昨天见的他。

en: Every time I went to see him, I found him at work.
zh: 我每次去找他，他都在干活。

en: I lied to him and he lied to me in turn.
zh: 我骗了他，反过来他也骗了我。

en: It is difficult, if not impossible, for me to beat him at tennis.
zh: 打网球想赢他很难，甚至根本不可能。

en: This is all that I know about him.
zh: 关于他，我就知道这么多。

en: What I told you about him also holds true for his brother.
zh: 我跟你说的关于他的那些事，对他弟弟也一样。

en: I offered him fifty pence and he accepted.
zh: 我给了他50便士，他收下了。

en: It is usually at the coffee shop that I meet him.
zh: 我通常是在咖啡馆跟他见面。

en: It is because he is cruel that I dislike him.
zh: 我不喜欢他是因为他这人太冷酷了。

en: It was this book that I borrowed from him.
zh: 我从他那儿借的就是这本书。

en: No sooner had I opened the box than a frog jumped out.
zh: 我刚一打开盒子，一只青蛙就跳了出来。

en: What have you done with the watch I bought for you?
zh: 我给你买的那块表，你弄哪儿去了？

en: I'll show you the car I've just bought.
zh: 我带你看看我刚买的那辆车。

en: I'll do the shopping for you.
zh: 我替你去买东西吧。

en: Whenever I get ready to go shopping, he invariably starts getting on my back.
zh: 每次我一准备去买东西，他就开始跟我啰嗦。

en: The coat I wanted was priced at three hundred dollars.
zh: 我看上的那件大衣要三百美元。

en: If I am a fool, you are another.
zh: 如果我是傻子，那你也一样。

en: There are several reasons why I have a fever.
zh: 我发烧有好几个原因。

en: Is there any room for me?
zh: 有我的位子吗？

en: They stopped quarreling when I came in.
zh: 我进来的时候，他们就不吵了。

en: Kuniko had already eaten when I came in.
zh: 我进来的时候，邦子已经吃过饭了。

en: He stood up when I went in.
zh: 我进去的时候，他站了起来。

en: They don't know that I'm Japanese.
zh: 他们不知道我是日本人。

en: It is forty years since I began studying Japanese.
zh: 我开始学日语已经四十年了。

en: The time came when I had to leave Japan.
zh: 我不得不离开日本的时候到了。

en: I came to Japan to see Kyoto.
zh: 我来日本是为了去京都看看。

en: I stayed in Japan only a few months.
zh: 我在日本只待了几个月。

en: I stayed in Japan only a few months, during which time I went through a series of hardships.
zh: 我在日本只待了几个月，在那期间我吃了不少苦。

en: That was my first visit to Japan.
zh: 那是我第一次去日本。

en: My refusing to eat meat occasioned an inconvenience, and I was frequently chided for my singularity.
zh: 我不吃肉带来了不少麻烦，我也常因为这个怪癖被责怪。

en: I am pleased with this vivid portrait in particular.
zh: 我特别喜欢这幅栩栩如生的画像。

en: It was near the river that I lost my way.
zh: 我是在河边迷的路。

en: I acted as a simultaneous interpreter.
zh: 我当时做的是同声传译。

en: Our company supports several cultural events.
zh: 我们公司赞助了好几个文化活动。

en: He waited for me until I arrived.
zh: 他一直等到我来为止。

en: The party was all but over when I arrived.
zh: 我到的时候，派对几乎已经结束了。

en: When I arrived, it was raining.
zh: 我到的时候正下着雨。

en: It is five years to a day since I came here.
zh: 我来这儿整整五年了。

en: It is ten years since I came to Tokyo.
zh: 我来东京已经十年了。

en: It's been ten years since I came to Tokyo.
zh: 我来东京已经有十年了。

en: It has been two months since my arrival in Tokyo.
zh: 我到东京已经两个月了。

en: If only she had known I was in Tokyo, she would have come to visit me.
zh: 要是她知道我在东京，就会来看我了。

en: The candidate whom I cast a vote for was elected.
zh: 我投的那位候选人当选了。

en: She looked sad because I was angry.
zh: 因为我生气了，她看起来很伤心。

en: The fact that I lost my temper made matters still worse.
zh: 我发脾气让事情变得更糟了。

en: The branch began to bend as I climbed along it.
zh: 我顺着树枝爬的时候，树枝开始弯了。

en: No sooner had I hung up the phone than there came another call.
zh: 我刚挂掉电话，又有一个电话打进来了。

en: He was busy when I called him up.
zh: 我给他打电话时，他正忙着呢。

en: While I was talking over the telephone she came to see me.
zh: 我正打电话的时候，她来看我了。

en: While I was talking on the phone, she came to see me.
zh: 我打着电话的时候，她就来找我了。

en: Pamela must have been at home when I tried to get in touch with her, but she didn't answer the telephone.
zh: 我联系帕梅拉时她肯定在家，但她没接电话。

en: She had just come home when I called.
zh: 我打电话时她刚到家。

en: Bob was on the point of leaving when I rang him up.
zh: 我给鲍勃打电话时，他正要走。

en: Bob was on the point of leaving when I called him.
zh: 我给鲍勃打电话时，他正要出门。

en: Bob was just about to leave when I telephoned him.
zh: 我给鲍勃打电话时他正准备走。

en: I have nothing to offer but blood, toil, tears and sweat.
zh: 我能提供的只有热血、辛劳、眼泪和汗水。

en: When I went down to the garden, two little girls were picking daisies.
zh: 我去花园时，有两个小女孩正在摘雏菊。

en: The last bus had already gone when I got to the bus stop.
zh: 我到车站时，末班车已经开了。

en: She will report directly to me.
zh: 她以后直接向我汇报。

en: It would be best if I met him in person.
zh: 最好还是我亲自去见他。

en: I'll personally visit you.
zh: 我会亲自去拜访你的。

en: I wish I had been a bird.
zh: 我要是只鸟就好了。

en: I made my brother my agent while I was out of the city.
zh: 我不在的时候，让我弟当我的代理。

en: When I got up this morning, it was raining.
zh: 今天早上我起床时，外面正在下雨。

en: As I was having lunch, the phone rang.
zh: 我正吃午饭呢，电话响了。

en: When I arrived, they quickly cleared out of the house.
zh: 我到的时候，他们赶紧从屋里搬走了。

en: She had already gone when I arrived.
zh: 我到的时候她已经走了。

en: The concert was all but over when I arrived.
zh: 我到的时候，音乐会快结束了。

en: By the time I arrived, he had already left.
zh: 等我到的时候，他已经走了。

en: She was sore at me for being late.
zh: 她因为我迟到生我气了。

en: In case I am late, please go ahead of me.
zh: 万一我迟到了，你们先走吧。

en: You may rely on my coming in time.
zh: 放心吧，我会准时到的。

en: Will you take this bag while I consult the map?
zh: 我查地图时，你能帮我拿一下包吗？

en: As far as I know, he is a reliable person.
zh: 据我所知，他这人挺靠谱的。

en: As far as I know, he is coming by car.
zh: 据我所知，他是开车来的。

en: To my knowledge, there are no good books on the theory.
zh: 据我了解，关于那个理论还没什么好书。

en: As far as I know, there are no good books on the theory.
zh: 据我所知，关于那个理论没什么好书。

en: Mr Smith, as I knew him, was a modest man.
zh: 在我印象中，史密斯先生是个很谦虚的人。

en: As far as I know, Mr. Smith was a modest man.
zh: 据我所知，史密斯先生以前是个很谦虚的人。

en: As far as I know, he is one of the best doctors in town.
zh: 据我所知，他是镇上最好的医生之一。

en: He is, so far as I know, a good guy.
zh: 据我所知，他是个好人。

en: As far as I know, she is a very good person.
zh: 据我所知，她人非常好。

en: It is the fact that I want to know.
zh: 我想知道的是事实真相。

en: What I want to know are the facts.
zh: 我想知道的是事实。

en: It's true that I want to know it.
zh: 我确实想知道这件事。

en: He took advantage of my ignorance and deceived me.
zh: 他趁我什么都不懂骗了我。

en: So far as I know, he used to be a good student.
zh: 据我所知，他以前是个好学生。

en: As far as I know, he used to be a good student.
zh: 据我了解，他以前成绩挺好的。

en: I know nothing except that she left last week.
zh: 除了知道她上周走了，我别的什么都不知道。

en: All I know is that she left last week.
zh: 我就知道她上周走了。

en: This is all I know.
zh: 我就知道这么多。

en: My decided preference is the fourth and the last of these alternatives.
zh: 这些选项里我肯定选第四个，也就是最后一个。

en: That's what I'm looking for.
zh: 这正是我在找的东西。

en: Do you know who I am?
zh: 你知道我是谁吗？

en: Don't think I'm made of money.
zh: 别以为我很有钱。

en: I owe it to my parents that I was able to finish college.
zh: 我能读完大学全靠我父母。

en: I owe it to my brother that I was able to finish college.
zh: 多亏了我哥，我才读完了大学。

en: It is ten years since I left college.
zh: 我大学毕业已经十年了。

en: It's been ten years since I left college.
zh: 我都大学毕业十年了。

en: I was active in politics when I was in the university.
zh: 我上大学那会儿挺热衷政治的。

en: When I entered the kitchen, she was making chicken curry with rice.
zh: 我进厨房的时候，她正在做咖喱鸡饭。

en: Little did they know that we were waiting.
zh: 他们压根儿不知道我们一直在那儿等着。

en: The man I was waiting for didn't turn up.
zh: 我等的那个男人最后没露面。

en: Words cannot describe the horror I experienced.
zh: 我经历的那种恐怖，真的没法用语言来形容。

en: The scolding I gave to the other children doesn't apply to you.
zh: 我刚才训其他孩子的话，对你并不适用。

en: The dog gave a yelp when I trod on its paw.
zh: 我踩到那条狗爪子的时候，它嗷地叫了一声。

en: Would you mind if I open the window?
zh: 我开下窗户你介意吗？

en: My leaving early made them feel sorry.
zh: 我提前离开让他们觉得挺遗憾的。

en: I have worked for one company where the payroll was snatched on a dark winter's night.
zh: 我以前在一家公司待过，那儿有次发工资的晚上，钱在黑灯瞎火的冬夜里被抢了。

en: I figure that my vote won't change anything.
zh: 我觉得我投这一票也改变不了什么。

en: This is the only guidebook that was recommended to me that is really useful.
zh: 这是别人推荐给我的所有指南里，唯一一本真正有用的。

en: This guidebook is the only one I found to be really useful out of all the ones recommended to me.
zh: 在所有推荐给我的指南里，我觉得只有这本才算真的好使。

en: Do you think it dangerous that I swim across the river?
zh: 你觉得我游过河去会有危险吗？

en: Do you think it's dangerous for me to swim across the river?
zh: 你觉得我游过河去是不是太危险了？

en: It was this hospital which I visited last month.
zh: 我上个月去的就是这家医院。

en: It was this hospital that I visited last month.
zh: 上个月我来的就是这家医院。

en: The president of the company, to whom I introduced you last Friday, wants to see you again.
zh: 我上周五介绍给你认识的那个公司总裁，想再见你一面。

en: I'll get there before you will.
zh: 我肯定会比你先到。

en: I ran off some of the oil.
zh: 我放掉了一些油。

en: The town in which I was born is famous for its old castle.
zh: 我出生的小镇因为有个古堡而挺出名的。

en: You shall want for nothing as long as I live.
zh: 只要我还活着，绝对不会让你缺任何东西。

en: You shall not for nothing as long as I live.
zh: 只要我还在，你就不会白白辛苦。

en: I'll never forget him as long as I live.
zh: 只要我活着，我就永远忘不了他。

en: So long as I live, you shall want for nothing.
zh: 只要我还活着，你就什么都不会缺。

en: I will never forget your kindness so long as I live.
zh: 只要我活着，我就永远不会忘记你的恩情。

en: As long as I live, you shall want for nothing.
zh: 只要我还活着，你就什么都少不了。

en: His eyes searched my face to see if I was talking straight.
zh: 他盯着我的脸，想看看我到底有没有说实话。

en: It is impossible for me to get there before noon.
zh: 我不可能在中午之前赶到那儿。

en: It turned out that I was right.
zh: 事实证明，我是对的。

en: You will see that I am right.
zh: 走着瞧吧，你会发现我是对的。

en: There is little prospect of my success.
zh: 我成功的希望不大。

en: His airplane had already left when I got to Narita Airport.
zh: 等我赶到成田机场的时候，他的飞机已经飞走了。

en: I owe my success to him.
zh: 我能成功全靠他。

en: I succeeded thanks to his advice.
zh: 多亏了他的建议，我才成功了。

en: I succeeded because of his advice.
zh: 我是因为听了他的建议才成功的。

en: My success was mainly due to your help.
zh: 我能成功主要是因为有你的帮助。

en: The reason I succeeded was because I was lucky.
zh: 我之所以能成功，是因为我运气好。

en: I will be afflicted that I do not know men.
zh: 我会因为不了解别人而感到困扰。

en: You are no more a god than I am.
zh: 你跟我一样，又不是神。

en: That is why I believe in the Press.
zh: 这就是为什么我相信新闻媒体。

en: It cost me a lot of money to build a new house.
zh: 造这栋新房子花了我不少钱。

en: I had hardly fallen asleep when the telephone rang.
zh: 我才刚睡着，电话就响了。

en: It was very kind of you to make dishes while I was down.
zh: 我生病那会儿你还给我做饭，真是太有心了。

en: Thank you for doing the cooking while I was sick in bed.
zh: 谢谢你在我生病卧床的时候帮我做饭。

en: Thank you for preparing meals for me while I was sick in bed.
zh: 谢谢你在我卧病在床的时候为我准备饭菜。

en: My belief is that you are right.
zh: 我相信你是对的。

en: The man I trusted betrayed me.
zh: 我信任的那个人背叛了我。

en: I had hardly finished my meal when my friend phoned me and invited me out for dinner.
zh: 我刚吃完饭，朋友就打电话约我出去吃大餐了。

en: It is very rude of you to expect me to eat food that I do not want to.
zh: 你非要让我吃不想吃的东西，这也太没礼貌了吧。

en: I had barely got aboard when the train began to move.
zh: 我刚跨上车，火车就开始动了。
